mean_en: the state or quality of being better, more skilful, more powerful, greater, etc. than others; behaviour that shows that you think you are better than other people
sentence: He wins the competition with obvious superiority.
sentence_trans: 他以明显的优势赢得了这次竞争的胜利。
word_etyma: super超级 + ior较…… + ity名词后缀 → 超过一般人的 → superiority优越（性）
